timeline.bodyText: There's ConnectRestException which you should use here.
timeline.author: tombentley

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if you should use ConnectRestException here. Until now ConnectRestException has been for lower level errors in handling the HTTP. Here the HTTP worked but returned something that wasn't valid JSON, or was not the expected JSON.
timeline.author: tombentley

timeline.bodyText: So we really want to assert on the exact version number? We'll end up having to do this every time we change the version of Kafka being used to run the test. I think it's enough to test non-emptiness.
timeline.author: tombentley
